numbered_ace_sentences: 2. If the parents of a person have more money, then this person is more likely to get into a better legacy school.
3. I wonder why it should matter whether the parents of a person are rich or poor.
4. If two persons have the same test scores, then these two persons should have an equal chance to get into a college.
6. This issue relates to my community.
7. Some people in my community are poor.
8. Some poor people want to get into a college that their parents attended.
9. Some poor people have good test scores.
10. Some poor people cannot get into that college.
